div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Governor Reynolds shared today, during her 11:00 press conference, that we will NOT return to school as we know it this year. Spring sports have also been canceled. With...

div.p: Mrs. Nelson's middle school science students experienced a presentation from Iowa State Universities Water Rocks outreach program. Students were taught about a watershed,...
We believe in you. We know you are strong. We miss you!
The first Middle School FCCLA member we would like to highlight this week is Kendra Miller. Question #1: Why are you an FCCLA member? Kendra is a 2nd year member and she...

div.p: Please sign up if you plan to participate in our free meal program next week! https://forms.gle/qhRQYY8HJ46Pmoex7
Please check your email, the district website's newsfeed or our district facebook page for new school closure information.

There was an error on the form sent out for free meals next week stating students needed to be present to receive the meals. That is NOT the case any longer. The form has been corrected. Thank you to those that reached out to let us know! https://forms.gle/9AfpFYGWmp1wLV4X9

West Monona has served a total of 2,372 free meals to our students thus far! Sign your students up for free breakfast and lunch next week by filling out our free meal form: https://forms.gle/2rcVmuPhe2KPsghJ9
High school students please check your school email. Thanks, Tim Chesnut

The West Monona Community School District offers career and technical programs in the following service areas: Family and Consumer Science Education, Business Education, Health Occupations Education, and Industrial Technology.

It is the policy of the West Monona Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact Julie Trepa, 1314 15th Street, Onawa, Iowa 51040, (712) 433-2043 or email julie.trepa@westmonona.org.
Copyright © West Monona CSD 2020. All rights reserved.

p.br: School has been cancelled for the remainder of the 2019-20 year. Spring sports have been cancelled. More to come on Summer sports. We will continue to provide free meals to students and educational updates as they occur.

Parents, please make sure your bookmarks are updated for JMC access. The correct address is westmonona.onlinejmc.com. We will be removing the redirect from our old JMC address, jmc.westmonona.org, soon. JMC can also be accessed by installing our mobile app via iOS/Android or by visiting our website at www.westmonona.org. On our website click on MENU on the top right of the page, click on PARENTS then click on JMC - Parents. Thank you!!!
